# <a name="error-550553-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="1ae85-102">Outlook.com 中的错误550/553</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1ae85-102">Error 550/553 in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="1ae85-103">当你离开家庭并使用 Outlook.com 从已连接的帐户发送电子邮件时, 你的电子邮件可能会返回550、553或中继被禁止的错误消息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1ae85-103">When you're away from home and send an email from your connected account using Outlook.com, your email message might be returned with a 550, 553, or relay-prohibited error message.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="1ae85-104">在 "**设置**" 中检查[电子邮件同步设置](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1ae85-104">Check your [email sync settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) at **Settings**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="1ae85-105">> **查看所有 Outlook 设置** > **邮件** > **同步电子**邮件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1ae85-105">> **View all Outlook settings** > **Mail** > **Sync email**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="1ae85-106">请确保默认的 "发件人" 地址与您的电子邮件域名相同。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1ae85-106">Make sure your default from address is the same as your email domain name.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="1ae85-107">如果您包含自己的电子邮件域, 请将其更改为您的 outlook.com、live.com 或 hotmail.com 地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="1ae85-107">If you have your own email domain included, change it to your outlook.com, live.com, or hotmail.com address.</span></span>
